resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf022b-fa00-42d5-2578-564b05fa3dc8#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A Palazzo Pubblico és mellete a torony, a Torre del Mangia</string>
            <string language="en">The Palazzo Pubblico and next to it the tower, the Torre del Mangia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Palazzo Pubblico und nahe bei ihm der Aufsatz, 
Torre Del Mangia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Palazzo Pubblico et à côté de lui la tour, 
Torre del Mangia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Palazzo Pubblico e ao lado dele a torre, Torre 
del Mangia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Palazzo Pubblico e vicino esso la torretta, il 
Torre del Mangia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Palazzo Pubblico και δίπλα σε τον ο πύργος, 
Torre δελ Mangia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Palazzo Pubblico y al lado de él la torre, 
Torre del Mangia</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A sienai főtéren ( il campo) látható a középkori városháza, a Palazzo Pubblico és mellete a torony, a Torre del Mangia.</string>
            <string language="en">The medieval town-hall, the Palazzo Pubblico, can be seen on the main square of Siena (il campo), and next to it the tower, the Torre del Mangia</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Palazzo Pubblico,  Torre del Mangia,  városháza,  várostorony,  gótikus építészet,  középkori város,  </string>
            <string language="en">Palazzo Publico, Torre del Mangia, town-hall, belfry, Gothic architecture, medieval town</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die mittelalterliche Stadt-Halle, das Palazzo 
Pubblico, kann auf das Hauptquadrat von Siena (il Campo) und nahe bei 
ihr gesehen werden der Aufsatz, Torre Del Mangia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le ville-hall médiéval, le Palazzo Pubblico, 
peut être vu sur la place principale de Siena (campo d'il), et 
à côté de lui la tour, Torre del Mangia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O cidade-salão medieval, o Palazzo Pubblico, 
pode ser visto no quadrado principal de Siena (campo do il), e ao lado
dele a torre, Torre del Mangia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il città-corridoio medioevale, il Palazzo 
Pubblico, può essere visto sul quadrato principale di Siena (campo 
del il) e vicino esso la torretta, il Torre del Mangia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μεσαιωνική πόλη-αίθουσα, το Palazzo Pubblico, 
μπορεί να δει στο βασικό τετράγωνο της Σιένα (IL 
campo), και δίπλα σε την ο πύργος, Torre δελ Mangia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ciudad-pasillo medieval, el Palazzo Pubblico, 
se puede ver en el cuadrado principal de Siena (campo del il), y al 
lado de él la torre, Torre del Mangia</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Palazzo Publico, Torre Del Mangia, Stadt-Halle, Belfry, 
gotische Architektur, mittelalterliche Stadt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Palazzo Publico, Torre del Mangia, ville-hall, 
beffroi, architecture gothique, ville médiévale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Palazzo Publico, Torre del Mangia, cidade-salão, torre
de sino, arquitetura gothic, cidade medieval</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Palazzo Publico, Torre del Mangia, città-corridoio, 
belfry, architettura gotica, città medioevale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Palazzo Publico, Torre δελ Mangia, πόλη-αίθουσα, 
καμπαναριό, γοτθική αρχιτεκτονική, μεσαιωνική πόλη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Palazzo Publico, Torre del Mangia, ciudad-pasillo, 
campanario de una iglesia, configuración gótica, ciudad medieval</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            </role>

        </lifeCycle>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>

        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
